main event: A half moon shaped object was observed in Millbrook, Alabama in January 1954.
interesting points: The observation was made 10 miles northwest of Maxwell Air Force Base.
The evaluation concluded that the sighting was a confirmed balloon.
The object was observed for 5-10 minutes.
The sighting was made by civilian observers, Mr. and Mrs. ***********.
Weather and wind data at the time and location of the sighting was provided.
